__e: If it's any consolation, I chose you because you're the best.

You ever think about why they picked you to be Sheriff? 'Cause I have.
But that's why I chose you to protect our girl.
- I chose you specifically for this task.
I can't believe he picked you over me.
You're only here because I chose you... both of you.
I'm sorry he didn't choose you.
Because you chose the wrong side.
I don't understand, why didn't you think about them before you chose the wrong side?
I'd rather see you live, knowing you chose the wrong side.
He made the wrong choice, and now he's dead.
I'd rather see you live, knowing you chose the wrong side.
Okay, so clearly I made the wrong choice, but that's just because I don't understand what you're trying to tell me.

And how, in heaven's name, did you pick on me?

And you chose to practice here?
Why did you choose not to run it?
And I don't think you ever were, which is why you chose me, isn't it?
What did you choose when you were me?

No. I chose to stay with him for all the things that he had done right
- But he's not here, is he? - No. No, he made his choice.
